fields.description:
Failure to reboot seen in QA/CI...
This NC is using Ceph w/ VPC. 
The NC was running 1 c1.medium VM.

The nephoria test...
{code}
def reboot_instances_in_zone_verify_volumes(self, zonelist=None, waitconnect=30, timeout=480):
        """
        Description:
                    Attempts to iterate through each instance in each zone and reboot the
                    instance(s).
                    Attempts to verify the attached volume state post reboot.
        """
{code}

from /var/log/eucalyptus/nc.log
{code}

fields.summary: Reduce instance termination rate on instance reboot

comments.body:
This has been seen on two systems, several times on each system while running the ebs-suite overnight in a loop ~600 tests. < 5% of tests failed this test. The first system is multi-cluster + ceph +vpc. The 2nd system is single cluster + ceph + vpc. 


From a second system...

2017-02-16T10:32:35.971272Z qemu-kvm: terminating on signal 15 from pid 14753
2017-02-16 10:32:36.229+0000: shutting down
2017-02-16 10:32:36.585+0000: shutting down
{code}
[~dmitrii], could you review c5c78defed50 from dev-vasya-EUCA-13245?

[~vasya], let's not remove instance lookup in {{doRebootInstance()}} even if you're not passing that pointer to rebooting_thread. That lookup guards against invalid instanceId coming in from CC: we can return an error instead of forking off a thread and failing silently.

As for adding {{save_instance_struct(instance);}} to record the new state on disk, I don't think they will accomplish anything. If NC is restarted, we do not have logic to continue the rebooting procedure, so either the restart happens before instance is restarted, in which case it will get cleaned up at startup or after, in which case NC will let it run.

{code}
2017-02-17 04:06:18 DEBUG 000011215 change_state             | [i-463d3a22] state change for instance: Running ->
 Booting (Extant)
2017-02-17 04:06:18 DEBUG 000011215 shutdown_then_destroy_do | shutting down instance
...
2017-02-17 04:06:19  WARN 000026809 refresh_instance_info    | [i-463d3a22] hypervisor reported previously runnin
g domain as Shutdown
2017-02-17 04:06:19 DEBUG 000026809 change_state             | [i-463d3a22] state change for instance: Booting ->
 Shutdown (Extant)
{code}
The proposed change just changed possibility for race conditions from about 20% to something really small. There is still race between monitoring and rebooting threads.
[~vasya], if there is a code change in 4.4 then there should be an associated bug that we can put in the release notes.
[~sjones], the fix does not fix 100% of cases. [~tony]/[~mclark], how about renaming current bug into "Reduce failure rate on instance reboot" and open a new one for >4.4?
Let's use EUCA-13018 for future development.
All discussed changed were added in 82fb574793

Re-ran the EBS automated tests for a few days with this patch. I did notice rebooted VMs were terminated at <= the previous rate and no signs of regressions. Closing this ticket per EUCA-13018
Thanks,
-M
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
